summary: This is an FBI/NYPD operations order form for the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein on child sex trafficking charges. It details the case background, planned arrest operation at Teterboro Airport upon his return to the US, and the subsequent execution of a search warrant at his New York residence. The document indicates Epstein was out of the country at the time and a silent notification was in place with Customs and Border Protection.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the arrest operation, accused of child sex trafficking from approximately 2002-2005 by enticing and recruiting dozens of minor girls for sex acts.

events.title: Epstein Indictment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted for violations of 18 USC 1591 (sex trafficking) and 18 USC 371 (conspiracy). The indictment was sealed.

events.title: Initial Operational Briefing
events.description: An initial briefing for the arrest operation was scheduled to take place in the C-20 squad area.

events.title: Planned Arrest Operation
events.description: A coordinated arrest operation planned for when Epstein returned to the US via Teterboro Airport. CBP would detain him, and FBI/NYPD would effect the arrest, followed by execution of a search warrant at his New York residence.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted on July 2, 2019, for child sex trafficking and conspiracy, and an arrest warrant was issued from the Southern District of New York.
The criminal activity described occurred from approximately 2002 through 2005 in both New York and Florida, involving dozens of minor girls aged 14 to 17.

At the time of the operations order (July 17, 2019), Epstein was out of the country, and a silent hit notification was in place with Customs and Border Protection to detain him upon his return to the US, specifically at Teterboro Airport.
A search warrant for Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, was to be sworn out and executed on the day of his arrest.
The modus operandi involved victims being recruited for massages that turned sexual, with Epstein paying them in cash and encouraging them to recruit other girls.
